title: Bloomberg Markets: Sheard on Seeing Fed Unwinding in September
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sheard on Seeing Fed Unwinding in September
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Paul Sheard Chief Economist S&P Global Discussing the Federal Reserve and other central banks’ plan to exit from quantitative easing.
